document_data.name: Stoneshoulder Creek
document_data.mainbody: '''Stoneshoulder Creek''' was a creek that ran across the steppes of the [[the Ride]], in the [[Moonsea North]] region of [[Faer√ªn]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}
document_data.Geography: The creek originated in the northern slops of the [[Dragonspine Mountains]], just east of the [[Citadel of the Raven]]. It snaked its way northeast before emptying into [[Lake Maltorus]].
